item0.name: Seraph's Embrace
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
860 Mana
  • Awe: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 5% bonus Mana.
  • Empyrean: Increase your maximum mana by 5% + 2.5% per 100 AP.

item1.name: Demonic Embrace
item1.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

item2.name: Liandry's Anguish
item2.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health (maxed at 1250 bonus Health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item3.name: Dark Seal
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

  • Awe: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 5% bonus Mana.
  • Empyrean: Increase your maximum mana by 5% + 2.5% per 100 AP.

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item3.name: Luden's Tempest
item3.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.
